text: Write the code as if it will be accompanied by a violent psychopath who knows where you live.
author: Steve McConnell

text: The complexity of the program grows until it exceeds the capabilities of the programmer
author: Arthur Bloch. Murphy's Laws

text: Walking on water and developing programs following the TOR is very easy ... if they are frozen
author: Napoleon Hill

text: Strive not for success, but for the values that it gives
author: Albert Einstein

text: I owe my success to the fact that I never made excuses and did not accept excuses from others.
author: Florence Nightingale

text: The hardest thing is to start acting, everything else depends only on perseverance
author: Amelia Earhart

text: One must love life more than the meaning of life
author: Fedor Dostoevsky

text: Life is what happens to you while you make plans
author: John Lennon

text: It is always worth starting with the fact that it sows doubts.
author: Boris Strugatsky

text: Real responsibility is only personal
author: Fazil Iskander

text: A meaningless life is not worth living
author: Socrates

text: 80% of success is to appear in the right place at the right time
author: Woody Allen

text: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life
author: Steve Jobs

text: Victory is not everything, everything is a constant desire to win
author: Vince Lombardi

text: Science is organized knowledge, wisdom is organized life
author: Immanuel Kant

text: There is no word «impossible» in my vocabulary
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

text: You will never cross the ocean unless you have the courage to lose sight of the shore
author: Christopher Columbus

text: Freedom is worthless if it does not include the freedom to make mistakes.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

text: Either you rule your day or the day rules you
author: Jim Rohn

text: Best Revenge - Huge Success
author: Frank Sinatra

text: Fall seven times and rise eight times
author: Japanese proverb

text: Everything has its own beauty, but not everyone can see it.
author: Confucius

text: How wonderful that you don't have to wait a minute to start making the world a better place.
author: Anne Frank

text: When I free myself from who I am, I become who I can be
author: Lao Tzu

text: Happiness is not something ready-made. Happiness depends only on your actions.
author: Dalai lama

text: If there is no wind, grab the oars
author: Latin proverb

text: Success is the ability to go from failure to failure without losing optimism
author: Winston Churchill

text: Everyone wants to change humanity, but no one thinks about how to change themselves
author: Lev Tolstoy

text: It is important to believe that talent is given to us for a reason - and that at any cost it must be used for something.
author: Marie Curie

text: Determination of purpose is the starting point of all achievements
author: William Clement Stone

text: We become what we think about
author: Earl Nightingale

text: I am not a victim of circumstances, I am the result of my decisions
author: Stephen Covey

text: All children are artists. The problem is staying an artist when you grow up
author: Pablo Picasso
